titleStmt.title: Augusta lachrymans: a funeral tear, to the memory of the worthy and honour'd Michael Godfrey, Esq; late Deputy-Governour of the Royal Bank of England: : unfortunately slain by a cannon ball, near His Majesty's person, in the trenches, at the siege of Namure. / By E. Settle.
titleStmt.author: Settle, Elkanah, 1648-1724.

titleStmt.title: Augusta lachrymans: a funeral tear, to the memory of the worthy and honour'd Michael Godfrey, Esq; late Deputy-Governour of the Royal Bank of England: : unfortunately slain by a cannon ball, near His Majesty's person, in the trenches, at the siege of Namure. / By E. Settle.
titleStmt.author: Settle, Elkanah, 1648-1724.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed, and are to be sold by Rich. Baldwin near the Oxford Arms Inn in Warwick Lane,
